Command: COMMAND + SHIFT + H or CTRL + SHIFT + H
Purpose: Smart Navigation up, which jumps to the previous action in a long program

Command: COMMAND + SHIFT + H or CTRL + SHIFT + N
Purpose: Smart Navigation down, which jumps to the next action in a long program

Command: COMMAND + SHIFT + H or CTRL + SHIFT + B
Purpose: Smart Navigation left, which jumps up the current scope

Command: COMMAND + SHIFT + H or CTRL + SHIFT + M
Purpose: Smart Navigation right, which jumps to the next scope
